Turn moments into memories!

Choose us for your next special occasion or get-together.

Got a birthday party, corporate event, or other event coming up? We're a great option for your celebration! Inquire today and let us know how we can make your special occasion perfect!
Inquire today 
premier house music lounge
Private events 
Celebrate in Style

Host your next private event in a setting that inspires and delights. Our dedicated team will work with you to create a customized dining experience that reflects your vision. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or corporate gathering, we ensure every detail is perfect for an unforgettable occasion!
inquire Now about Private Events 
vip tables

Reserve with ease!

Looking to throw an unforgettable birthday party? Planning a corporate event with serious style? Whether you're celebrating a milestone, organizing a team outing, or just want to party with your closest friends—Babylon is the ultimate destination.

About Us 
Welcome to Babylon - where global beats meet Southern streets. With big city energy and Charleston soul, Babylon is your destination for unforgettable nights, vibrant music, and a scene that never sleeps.
request a table 
Gallery
Skip Gallery Carousel Start stop gallery carousel 
Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Naël:
five star review by 
Visited Babylon Club last week and had an amazing time! Friendly staff, classy interior, great music, awesome lighting / sound system, and delicious drinks. We had so much fun! Definitely one of my new favorite spots in Charleston. Can't wait to come back!

Review by - Google

Maggie H:
five star review by 
Great vibes, amazing cocktails, and super friendly staff. The atmosphere was the perfect mix of chill and lively, and the service was top-notch. Easily one of the best bars in downtown Charleston - can't wait to come back!

Review by - Google

Mike C:
five star review by 
Classy and elegant, yet warm and inviting. Definitely my new spot! Entertainment and staff are on point, well done!

Review by - Google

Joe T:
five star review by 
A perfect combination of amazing vibes, service, food and entertainment. The beat hits different for sure. Highly recommended!

Newsletter
